title: Bug 104197"Type"/"size" in chart builder won't be disabled if uncheck Marker "Is Visible",
description: description:steps to reproduce:1.drag a chart to layout view.2.select Y series in attributes tab3.Checkbox Marker's "Is visible" or uncheck it won't disabled/enable Type andsize in this panelactual result:if Uncheck Marker "Is Visible", "Type"/"size" in this panel should be disabledexpected result:if Uncheck Marker "Is Visible", "Type"/"size" in this panel should be disabled
